Documentation

Learn how to build a website with boba, today!

Breakpoints

Reference of all of boba's breakpoints
Breakpoints
xs Mobile up to 575px
sm Tablet between 576px and 767px
md Laptop between 768px and 991px
lg Desktop between 992px and 1381px
xl Widescreen above 1381px

Helpers

Helpers are utility classes for additional features
Hide / Show
.hide Hides component
.hide-xs Hides component when breakpoint is xs or less
.hide-sm Hides component when breakpoint is sm or less
.hide-md Hides component when breakpoint is md or less
.hide-lg Hides component when breakpoint is lg or less
.hide-xl Hides component when breakpoint is xl or less
Spacing
.marginless Removes all margin
.paddingless Removes all padding
Other
.radiusless Removes all radius
.shadowless Removes all shadow
